category.delete_category_alert_one: {{count}} report will be deleted with this category.
category.delete_category_alert_other: {{count}} reports will be deleted with this category.
category.move_report_to_this_category_one: Move the report to this category

directory.delete_directory_alert_one: {{count}} report will be deleted with this directory.
directory.delete_directory_alert_other: {{count}} reports will be deleted with this directory
directory.move_report_to_this_directory_one: Move the report to this directory

connector.database_name_tooltip: For a PostgreSQL connection, this field corresponds to the schema name to used by default.
connector.delete_connector_alert_one: {{count}} report will be deleted with this report
connector.delete_connector_alert_other: {{count}} reports will be deleted with this report
connector.delete_input_parameter_alert_one: {{count}} input parameter will be deleted with this report
connector.delete_input_parameter_alert_other: {{count}} input parameters will be deleted with this report
connector.super_admin_limitation: Super-admin user cannot create report. You have to use an account with a Developer role in order to create any report.
connector.you_are_super_admin: You are logged as super-admin user
connector.you_should_setup_a_connector: You should setup a connector in order to access your data.
connector.you_should_setup_a_dev_account: You have to setup a developer user. (with Developer and Admin roles).
connector.will_delete_everything: Will delete _all_ reports, input parameters and SQL drafts using this connector.
connector.will_update_report_and_input_parameters: Will update all reports, input parameters and SQL drafts with the selected connector below.

organization.delete_organization_alert_one: {{count}} report will be deleted with this organization.
organization.delete_organization_alert_other: {{count}} reports will be deleted with this organization.

input_parameters.can_use_multiple_value: You can put multiple values, coma separated, when parameter is a multi-select type.

service_message.service_message_explanation: Inform your users with service messages, visible by everyone ih the "Home" tab.

user.delete_user_alert_one: {{count}} report will be deleted with this user.
user.delete_user_alert_other: {{count}} reports will be deleted with this user .
user.force_user_to_reset_his_password_at_next: Force user to reset his password at next login
user.you_should_setup_dev_user: You should setup a developer user before creating any report. (with roles "developer" and "admin".)
user.will_delete_everything: Will delete _all_ reports and SQL drafts created by this user.
user.will_update_report_and_input_parameters: Will update all reports and SQL drafts with the selected user below.

version.please_check_release_not: RootDB v{{version}} is now available. You can check release notes
